_guide: HOW TO ADD NEW PUBLICATIONS: Copy a publication object below and update the fields

_fields.title: Publication title
_fields.link: URL to the publication (PDF or article page)

publications.title: Deep Learning Model Compression Techniques Performance on Edge Devices
publications.authors: Rachmanto, R., Nabhaan, A., & Setyanto, A.
publications.journal: MATRIK : Jurnal Manajemen, Teknik Informatika Dan Rekayasa Komputer
publications.description: This paper evaluated model compression methods based on accuracy, latency, model size, and time to compress overhead. The research concluded that knowledge distillation is the most effective method, offering up to 11.4x model size reduction and a 78.67% latency speedup, with only a moderate loss in accuracy and compression time.

publications.title: Characterizing Hardware Utilization on Edge Devices when Inferring Compressed Deep Learning Models
publications.authors: Nabhaan, A., Rachmanto, R., & Setyanto, A.
publications.journal: MATRIK : Jurnal Manajemen, Teknik Informatika Dan Rekayasa Komputer
publications.description: This paper explores the performance and resource utilization of compressed deep learning models on edge devices.

publications.title: Characterizing Deep Learning Model Compression with Post-Training Quantization on Accelerated Edge Devices
publications.authors: R. D. Rachmanto, Z. Sukma, A. N. L. Nabhaan, A. Setyanto, T. Jiang and I. K. Kim
publications.journal: 2024 IEEE International Conference on Edge Computing and Communications (EDGE)
publications.description: This work is the first comprehensive characterization study of online model compression on resource-constrained edge devices. The team evaluated various deep learning models with different sizes and resource requirements, focusing on post-training quantization (PTQ) using recent NVIDIA edge devices.
